column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////So where did you take your very Christian
column2: very picky about eating "strange" food parents to eat when they are meeting your boyfriend's Asian parents and brother that like to eat "unusual" food.  I know! Let's go to Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba.  After all
column3: this is the first place that we ate on our first date.  How perfect and it was... I always want to get my parents to try new things
column4: though things like calamari are different for them.  Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba offers perfect choices for both the Asian parents and the white parents to try new foods.  It went great and the food was amazing as usual.
